meanings.definition: A shelf or stand for holding books.
meanings.sent1: I organized my books neatly on the bookrack in my room.
meanings.sent2: The library had a large bookrack filled with all kinds of books.
meanings.sent3: The bookrack in the classroom looked like it was doing a balancing act with all the books on it.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a bookrack, holding onto memories and stories.
meanings.sent5: The bookrack stood proudly in the corner, showcasing a collection of literary treasures.

meanings.definition: To place books on a shelf or stand.
meanings.sent1: She carefully bookracked the new novels she bought at the bookstore.
meanings.sent2: Every evening, he bookracks his favorite books before going to bed.
meanings.sent3: The librarian bookracked the books with such precision, it was like watching a skilled performer.
meanings.sent4: As she bookracked the books, she felt a sense of accomplishment and order.
meanings.sent5: He bookracked the books one by one, creating a colorful display of literary works.
